comment: Different ways to categorise a word semantically

name: Comment
comment:
In linguistics, conjugation is the creation of derived forms of a verb from its principal parts by inflection

Besides this, there are also other ways to alter a word to add/change meaning, this should be summed up using this enum.

name: Comment
comment:
WordMatrix is a matrix that contains as much information about a word as possible in as many languages as possible. Easy to use for 1:1 translation

@see Language
rawStatement:
export type WordMatrix = WordLanguageInfoObject &
  WordInfo &
  CoreWordMatrixWord &
  SlugModelType;

name: Comment
Comment
comment: Best way to combine words if you don't want to specify all language specific info for a new word. You can refer to words from the WordMatrix instead!
